Key Match Events: England and Switzerland drew 1-1 after extra time, with England winning 5-3 on penalties.
Post-Match Reflections: UEFA has confirmed that an investigation will be conducted regarding Jude Bellingham's potential violation of the basic rules of decent conduct.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jude Bellingham is at risk of missing the quarter-final match against Switzerland due to a possible one-match ban.
Others: The article discusses the potential absence of Jude Bellingham from the England team due to a possible suspension, and the possible lineup changes that could occur as a result.
